task.title: Disabling a Developer Portal subscription
task.shortdesc: You can temporarily or permanently disable a Developer Portal subscription on the Configure APIs and Applications Applications page.

step.cmd: Go to Configure APIs and Applications Applications .
Navigate to the Application Name within the API Gateway panel, and click # Subscriptions in the Subscriptions column.
step.stepresult: The Subscription details page opens with a list of the Subscriptions for the application.

step.cmd: For the API Name, Environment, and Plan that you want to disable, click Enabled in the Status column.
step.stepresult: The API Subscription Status menu opens.

step.info: From the Applications page, you can disable additional Developer Portal subscriptions.
